product_name: 180s Tec Fleece Ear Warmers with Headphones - 2013 Overstock
long_description: Keep your ears toasty warm this winter while enjoying your favorite music. 180s Tec Fleece Ear Warmers, made from layers of soft fleece, offer wind-resistant protection and have built-in headphones. Compatible with most handheld devices, including smartphones and MP3 players; headphones include microphone for hands-free conversation. Built-in stereo headphones have a detachable cord in case you don't need your tunes. Breathable and moisture-wicking fleece with polyester insulation keeps you warm, dry and comfortable; soft fleece lining is comfortable next to skin. 180s Tec Fleece Ear Warmers with Headphones fit comfortably around the back of the head and over your ears; click-to-fit frame adjusts to fit various head sizes. Collapsible design provides convenient storage in your pocket, handbag, briefcase or glove compartment. Ear warmers styling allows wear with hats, helmets or glasses. Overstock.
short_description: Keep your ears toasty warm this winter while enjoying your favorite music. 180s Tec Fleece Ear Warmers, made from layers of soft fleece, offer wind-resistant protection and have built-in headphones.
